column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Crossaint: GOD YES (yes
column2: I actually said this out loud inside the restaurant; it was that good). This took me back to the cozy boulangeries of southern France. Fluffy
column4: while a crisp texture on the outside held the whole thing together. These are huge and definitely shareable. Just buttery enough so you get lots of flavor
column5: but not so much that it feels heavy inside of you.
